actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to continue the minimum monthly insurance benefits under title II of the Social Security Act for individuals currently entitled to such benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that the minimum social security benefit provisions under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act shall continue to apply to individuals who are currently entitled to monthly insurance benefits or who initially become entitled to such benefits before 1982.

titles.title: A bill to continue the minimum monthly insurance benefits under title II of the Social Security Act for individuals currently entitled to such benefits.
